metadata.title: WR Purple Light Spots Backdrop Dreamy Glitter Dots Halos Photography Background Girl Birthday Party Baby Shower Decor Banner Video Photo Studio Props, 7x5FT
features: ❤Package：1 PCS 7x5ft(210cmWidth x150cm Height)backdrop.NOT Included Stand,Pole Pocket or Clips.
❤Material:Vinyl material, high-definition background,computer-printed for realism.Printed on chemical fiber material for light weight and easy handling,excellent color treatment and realistic detail.
❤ Applicable scene:Purple Light Spots Backdrop,Dreamy Glitter Dots Halos Photography Background,Girl Birthday Party makeups,Video Photo Studio Props ,instantly liven up your party setting!

❤ Usage: Item ent folded,Resulting in crease. The recovery methods as following:roll it up tightly with a cylinder and then just waiting for 2 to 4 days. The wrinkles and crease are almost removed. If necessary, you can iron the back surface with steam iron but not dry iron. Iron it with low heat.

❤ Service:We can customize any size or patterns for you. For your satisfaction, We have so many colors, themes, patterns, sizes backdrops for choice, but please let us know if you have any idea for your party or room decoration, we‘d like to make it become real.
description: :  1. 1 piece Photography Backdrop (Folding).  2.Background Stands and clips not included. ✿
: Using backdrop clamps to hang on a stand. Or recommend using this and self-adhesive hooks that temporarily stick to the wall. ✿

: You will receive just the backdrop without the stand.All backdrops will send by folded, because according to rule of post office, length of item cannot be more than 1.2 m.If have creased, do not worry, remove method as follows: 1.Roll it up tightly with a cylinder, and waiting for 3-4 days. 2.Heat it with a steam iron on the back of item, then it will be smooth again. ✿
: The backdrops need keep distance to take pictures. Also many large format images may seem a little pixelated ✿
: Have any question, please feel free to contact me. Your suggestion will make us do better, let you more satisfied. Thank you for your understanding！

title: HONEST REVIEW - Watch before you buy
